item.title: my blogdown...well, blog
item.description: Written during… @ Sunday, November 7th right after midnight Monday, November 8th night Thursday, November 11th night Monday, November 11th night Some nonsense for starters… A big portion of my day-to-day consists in journaling in small parts. Or, rather, noting down many of the things I do, I’ve done, I have to do,…etc. I find that it’s easier-for me, at least- to process everything that happens in a day if I write it down, for some reason.
